thread.section_title: OneSimCard Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OneSimCard | www.onesimcard.com
thread.title: Peter

author: Peter
title: Peter
text: I have been travelling overseas for many years, primarily to Japan and until discovering OneSimCard went without effective mobile communication. Since purchasing OneSimCard 3 years ago I use it whenever I travel and it has proven to be a perfect solution for my mobile communication. It works well, it is value for money and any problems are quickly resolved. Suffice to say I wouldn't be without it.
